verses.verse: Put <S%G5279><s%> <S%G846>them<s%> in <S%G5279>mind<s%> to be in subjection <S%G5293>to<s%> <S%G746>rulers<s%>, <S%G2532>to<s%> <S%G1849>authorities<s%>, to be <S%G3980>obedient<s%>, to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%>,

to speak <S%G987>evil<s%> of no <S%G3367>man<s%>, not to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G269>contentious<s%>, to be <S%G1933>gentle<s%>, <S%G1731>showing<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4236>meekness<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>.

not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> done <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G235>ourselves<s%>, but according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> he <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3067>washing<s%> of <S%G3824>regeneration<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G342>renewing<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>,

that <S%G2443><s%>, being <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G1565>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>, we might be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2818>heirs<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.

Faithful <S%G4103><s%> is the <S%G3056>saying<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> concerning these <S%G5130>things<s%> I <S%G1014>desire<s%> <S%G1226>that<s%> <S%G4571>thou<s%> affirm <S%G1226>confidently<s%>, to the end <S%G2443>that<s%> they who have <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> may be <S%G5431>careful<s%> to <S%G4291>maintain<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>. These <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5624>profitable<s%> unto <S%G444>men<s%>:

When <S%G3752><s%> I shall <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G734>Artemas<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%>, give <S%G4704>diligence<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3533>Nicopolis<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> I have <S%G2919>determined<s%> to <S%G3914>winter<s%>.

Set <S%G4311>forward<s%> <S%G2211>Zenas<s%> the <S%G3544>lawyer<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G625>Apollos<s%> on their <S%G4311>journey<s%> <S%G4709>diligently<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> be <S%G3007>wanting<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.
